name: core_arch::x86::avx2::_mm256_mul_epu32

convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.

intrinsics::simd::simd_and.doc:
"And"s vectors elementwise.

 `T` must be a vector of integers.

intrinsics::simd::simd_mul.doc:
Multiplies two simd vectors elementwise.

 `T` must be a vector of integers or floats.

doc:
Multiplies the low unsigned 32-bit integers from each packed 64-bit
 element in `a` and `b`

 Returns the unsigned 64-bit results.

 [Intel's documentation](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/docs/intrinsics-guide/index.html#text=_mm256_mul_epu32)
